revised_title: Sir David Orme Masson: A Pioneering Figure in Australian Science
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
tldr: The article is an obituary for Sir David Orme Masson, a prominent figure in Australian science who contributed to the development of chemistry education and administration. Masson was a key influence in fostering science in Australia and played a significant role in the growth of the University of Melbourne. He made important contributions to the understanding of atomic volumes, solution theory, and the periodic classification of elements.
